statements: SELECT * FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, department_id FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_cost FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT * FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT department_id, AVG(maintenance_cost) AS avg_cost FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_cost FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment WHERE usage_hours BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_cost, usage_hours FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment WHERE department_id = 2 AND maintenance_cost < 500;
SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) AS total_equipment FROM Monitoring_Medical_Equipment GROUP BY department_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_equipment DESC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentUsage
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, usage_timestamp FROM EquipmentUsage WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT equipment_name, usage_type FROM EquipmentUsage ORDER BY usage_type ASC
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE cost < 100.00
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, usage_timestamp FROM EquipmentUsage WHERE quantity < 3
SELECT * FROM EquipmentUsage WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY usage_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, usage_type, quantity FROM EquipmentUsage WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Printer%' ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_usage FROM EquipmentUsage GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING total_usage > 50;
SELECT e.equipment_name, r.allocation_date FROM EquipmentUsage e JOIN ResourceAllocation r ON e.id = r.equipment_id ORDER BY r.allocation_date;

SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS allocations_count FROM EquipmentUsage e JOIN ResourceAllocation r ON e.id = r.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING allocations_count > 3 ORDER BY allocations_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Equipment_Usage
SELECT equipment_name, usage_duration FROM Medical_Equipment_Usage ORDER BY usage_duration DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Medical_Equipment_Usage WHERE usage_duration > 10
SELECT staff_name, specialization, department FROM Medical_Staff WHERE department = 'Surgery'
SELECT staff_name, allocation_date FROM Medical_Staff JOIN Resource_Allocation ON Medical_Staff.staff_id = Resource_Allocation.staff_id
SELECT * FROM Medical_Equipment_Usage;
SELECT equipment_name, usage_duration FROM Medical_Equipment_Usage ORDER BY usage_duration DESC;
SELECT staff_name, specialization, department FROM Medical_Staff WHERE department = 'Surgery';
SELECT * FROM Resource_Allocation WHERE allocation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT equipment_name, staff_name FROM Medical_Equipment_Usage JOIN Resource_Allocation ON Medical_Equipment_Usage.equipment_id = Resource_Allocation.equipment_id JOIN Medical_Staff ON Resource_Allocation.staff_id = Medical_Staff.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, vendor, location FROM Equipment WHERE vendor = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT user_name, email FROM User WHERE department = 'IT' AND user_id > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE location IN ('New York', 'London') ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cost_Optimization WHERE cost_saved > 1000 AND optimization_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE location='Lab A';
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE vendor='Vendor XYZ';
SELECT * FROM Usage_Log WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT User.user_name, User.department, Usage_Log.duration_minutes FROM User JOIN Usage_Log ON User.user_id = Usage_Log.user_id;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, Cost_Optimization.cost_saved FROM Equipment JOIN Cost_Optimization ON Equipment.equipment_id = Cost_Optimization.equipment_id WHERE Cost_Optimization.cost_saved > 5000 ORDER BY cost_saved DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT staff_name, job_title FROM Staff ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, zipcode FROM Location WHERE city='New York';
SELECT equipment_name, location_id, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, location_id FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer';
SELECT equipment_name, cost FROM Equipment WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT e.equipment_name, l.location_name, u.usage_datetime FROM Equipment e JOIN Location l ON e.location_id = l.location_id JOIN UsageLog u ON e.equipment_id = u.equipment_id;
SELECT e.equipment_name, c.total_cost FROM Equipment e JOIN CostMetrics c ON e.equipment_id = c.equipment_id WHERE c.total_cost < 1000 ORDER BY c.total_cost ASC;
